statements: SELECT * FROM customer_activity;
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM customer_activity WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS total_activities FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM customer_activity GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, activity_type FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, activity_type FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND customer_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS activity_count FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_duration FROM customer_activity;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, page_visited, time_spent, engagement_score FROM engagement_data WHERE time_spent > 10;
SELECT customer_id, activity_type FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'click';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(activity_duration) AS max_activity_duration FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_duration FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_duration > 30 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, page_visited, time_spent FROM engagement_data WHERE time_spent >= 60 AND engagement_score > 0.8 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;

SELECT * FROM customer_activity INNER JOIN engagement_data ON customer_activity.customer_id = engagement_data.customer_id WHERE customer_activity.activity_type = 'signup' AND engagement_data.page_visited = 'homepage' ORDER BY customer_activity.activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity;
SELECT customer_id, activity_timestamp FROM customer_activity WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, activity_type FROM customer_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_page_views) AS total_views FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM page_views WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY view_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, total_page_views, total_duration_seconds FROM engagement_metrics WHERE total_page_views > 100 ORDER BY total_page_views DESC
SELECT page_id, customer_id, view_timestamp, duration_seconds FROM page_views WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY view_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM customer_activity WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, total_page_views, total_duration_seconds FROM engagement_metrics WHERE total_duration_seconds < 500 ORDER BY total_duration_seconds ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, join_date FROM Customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PageViews WHERE page_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS page_views_count FROM PageViews GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT page_url, timestamp FROM PageViews WHERE customer_id = 2 AND page_url LIKE '%homepage%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_clicks FROM Clickstream GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_clicks > 5 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM Customers c JOIN Purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM page_views WHERE timestamp > '2022-02-15 12:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(view_id) AS total_views FROM page_views GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_views > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) as total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT p.*, s.plan_id FROM purchases p INNER JOIN subscriptions s ON p.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT c.name, p.amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 1000;
